short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find the words you need to know when you browse in a foreign language.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: To learn English, Chinese or Japanese, you should read what you want. This will let you learn words for your test as you read for fun. In English, Read Nose will sniff out words from the new General Service List and Academic Word List on any English website. Then you can study just what you need. If you are learning Japanese, select the JLPT vocabulary word list. If you are learning Traditional Chinese, select the TOC word list. When you find the words you need, write them down in your vocabulary notebook to review later.
